properties.title: Wildstrubelhütte SAC
properties.description: The cabin is a destination for mountain hikers, ski mountaineers and very experienced mountain bikers. Located on the borders of the cantons of Berne and Valais close to the impressive «Plaine Morte», the cabin offers a bouldering room and dog crates. One is impressed by the two original lounges with their wooden tables and wooden panelling. The view goes across the archaic landscape of Rawil on to the glacier world of Wildhorn. Ski mountaineers visit the cabin on the «Berner Haute Route» Les Diablerets – Gemmi – Grimsel.
